# og-toggle-switch



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                        | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | -------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Determines, whether the control is disabled or not | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `value`    | `value`    | The value of the toggle-switch                     | `boolean` | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event     | Description                                | Type                      |
| --------- | ------------------------------------------ | ------------------------- |
| `changed` | Event is being emitted when value changes. | `CustomEvent<MouseEvent>` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                               | Description                                                   |
| -------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `--og-toggle-switch__indicator-Background`         | Background of the toggle switch icon (shorthand)              |
| `--og-toggle-switch__indicator-Background--active` | Background of the toggle switch icon when active (shorthand)  |
| `--og-toggle-switch__indicator-Background--hover`  | Background of the toggle switch icon when hovered (shorthand) |
| `--og-toggle-switch__indicator-Height`             | Width of the toggle switch icon                               |
| `--og-toggle-switch__indicator-Left`               | Left position of the toggle switch icon                       |
| `--og-toggle-switch__indicator-Top`                | Top position of the toggle switch icon                        |
| `--og-toggle-switch__indicator-TranslateX`         | X position of the active toggle switch icon                   |
| `--og-toggle-switch__indicator-Width`              | Width of the toggle switch icon                               |
| `--og-toggle-switch__toggle-Background`            | Main background of the toggle switch (shorthand)              |
| `--og-toggle-switch__toggle-Background--active`    | Main background of the toggle switch when active (shorthand)  |
| `--og-toggle-switch__toggle-Background--hover`     | Main background of the toggle switch when hovered (shorthand) |
| `--og-toggle-switch__toggle-BorderColor`           | Border color of the toggle switch                             |
| `--og-toggle-switch__toggle-BorderWidth`           | Border width of the toggle switch                             |
| `--og-toggle-switch__toggle-Height`                | Height of the toggle switch (box model: border-box)           |
| `--og-toggle-switch__toggle-Padding`               | Padding of the toggle switch                                  |
| `--og-toggle-switch__toggle-Width`                 | Width of the toggle switch (box model: border-box)            |
